about_the_game:
Join the arena and play Rollink! Challenge a friend to a 1v1 battle or compete against up to 7 opponents to claim the Crown of Destiny!



Experience a unique and innovative combination of cards and autochess set in a medieval fantasy world. Feel the adrenaline rush as your cards turn and your troops clash. Strategize and make the best hands to compete for the crown of destiny, a symbol of supreme power, or risk watching your gold be taken by other competitors.



Uncover ancient family histories and missions on the table of fate while you play as medieval lords with distinct voice acting and personalities. The story takes place in the era of turbulence under the reign of ill-fated Caesar XV, where the next successor shall rise from the arena to subdue the queen of pirates, who has closed secret deals with the monstrous flying dragons.



Take a glimpse of Caesar Empire's former splendour through the marble-pillared corridor, sumptuous palace, and magnificant arena. The solemn yet majestic fuse of orchestra and choir, along with clinking drops of gold and belligerent speech of the lords, invite you to a mythical land far, far away.



Summon powerful creatures and valiant troops for a spectacular fight in the arena. Trample your enemies with powerful lord skills as your cards turn into units and battle to death for you.



Fold or all in! The odds are changing every minute. Bet strategically because winning is only secured with the right blend of cards, spells and skills.



Inspired by but beyond the classic Texas Hold'em gameplay, Game of Rollink holds infinite replayability given its vast combination of lords, hands and spells. Even beginners will get a hang of the game mechanics and be intrigued in a few rounds.

short_description: Game of Rollink is a PvP card game with auto-battler, where you play as a medieval lord to outwit sinister opponents on the gaming table and seize the supreme throne. Bet wisely because gold and countless lives of loyal soldiers are at stake. Make your best hand and may the odds be in your favor.
